body_html: cudnn supports projection layer in LSTM starting from 7.1.2, it is not exposed in pytorch though, as we did not see a lot of demand for it. cudnn will support LSTM cell clipping in the next version.
body_text: cudnn supports projection layer in LSTM starting from 7.1.2, it is not exposed in pytorch though, as we did not see a lot of demand for it. cudnn will support LSTM cell clipping in the next version.
body: cudnn supports projection layer in LSTM starting from 7.1.2, it is not exposed in pytorch though, as we did not see a lot of demand for it. cudnn will support LSTM cell clipping in the next version.
